### `r variable$name`

Property      | Value  
------------- | -------------
Value type    | `r variable$valueType`
Entity type   | `r variable$entityType`

#### Descriptive Statistics

```{r, echo=FALSE, comment="", eval=(variable$valueType == 'integer' | variable$valueType == 'decimal')}
opal.execute(o, paste0("summary(D$", variable$name, ")"))
```

#### Histogram

```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=(variable$valueType == 'integer' | variable$valueType == 'decimal')}
plot(opal.execute(o,paste0("hist(D$",variable$name,")")))
```
